name: Zompuzzler
description:
This is a fun simple halloween themed quiz game. This game is prototype only and in more time I would add multiplayer, self moving game pieces, more questions and more.

All art assets are made by me in the 48 hours, the music used was not made nor owned by me and the credit is as follows:

Author: 
Wolfgang

https://opengameart.org/content/skeleton-waltz-theme
